channel.title: Bulgaria on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Bulgaria on Preslav Rachev

item.description: My new favorite coffee mug - a special “You Are Here” Starbucks edition featuring Bulgaria. From what I heard, also quite a rare collectible item.

item.title: Sofia's Trams
item.description: It has been almost a decade, since I last set foot in the city center of Bulgaria’s capital, Sofia. Although I fly home regularly, Sofia’s Airport is just an intermediary stop on my ultimate route to my hometown. This time was different. My wife and I flew for the wedding of one of our best friends, and since we had a whole day to spare, we decided to take a walk through the centre of the City of Trams.
